<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1wl4alz"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/3874d29ba01c4ebbedc09d41d0b22fb9/tumblr_inline_nebus3ZU0R1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span>arc5555’Ss entry into the <a href="http://bit.ly/1wl4alz"><strong>KSPumpkin</strong></a> contest got a bit, shall we say, redirected along the way. Get your own entries in before November 1 (tomorrow!) and you may win yourself a treat, just like arc5555 might.</span></p>
That's really cool. I wish I had the patients for paper-craft... at least I think that's paper-craft...
Looks almost like 3D printed... ShapeWays custom order, maybe?

"Our posturings, our imagined self-importance, the delusion that we have some privileged position in the Universe, are challenged by this point of pale light. Our planet is a lonely speck in the great enveloping cosmic dark. In our obscurity, in all this vastness, there is no hint that help will come from elsewhere to save us from ourselves." - Carl Sagan

dare45
